overview: Daniel Scalisi is President and founder of Mobilecause. He is responsible for overall company product and growth strategies for company. He oversees the operations, development, and sales teams. As serial entrepreneur, Daniel has successfully built numerous technology companies in both web and mobile markets. Additionally Daniel spent time in the Venture Capital markets helping reorganize a number of portfolio companies. Since June of 2009, Daniel has lead Mobilecause to become the leading web service for mobile fundraising with hundreds of national customers.
